DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter prospective , randomize control clinical trial compare open label use sirolimus azathioprine tacrolimus-based immunosuppression regimen . Eligible patient identify 90-day screening period immediately transplantation randomize via computer-generated scheme . Patient randomization stratify accord center rejection status first 90 day transplantation . All patient receive IL-2 receptor antagonist induction therapy , tacrolimus , azathioprine , corticosteroid 90 day transplantation . At 90 day transplantation , patient randomize 1:1 ratio either continue azathioprine change azathioprine sirolimus . The dosing level immunosuppressive medication standardize patient include study . Tacrolimus dose 0.04 mg/kg twice daily target trough level 5 15 ng/ml , azathioprine administer 2 mg/kg daily dose adjustment leukopenia , sirolimus initially dosed 2 mg/day target trough level 5 15 ng/ml , prednisone taper 10 mg/day 3 month transplantation . All patient receive induction therapy either daclizumab basiliximab per product package insert . In addition , prophylactic antimicrobial standardize among participate site . All patient either donor and/or recipient cytomegalovirus ( CMV ) -positive serostatus receive either intravenous ganciclovir oral valganciclovir total 90 day . Lung transplant recipient negative donor recipient CMV serostatus receive valacyclovir 90 day . Antifungal prophylaxis determine site . Pneumocystis jiroveci prophylaxis continue throughout study . Lipid-lowering medication recommend accord National Cholesterol Education Program guideline .
